title: Development of Technology-Enhanced Instructional Design Strategies in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasis on technology-integrated lesson design practice through a hybrid approach combining face-to-face workshops and online collaboration platforms.

learning_goals: Three or more digital tools (e.g., GeoGebra, Desmos) for explaining mathematical concepts can be effectively utilized
Technology-integrated lesson designs can be developed considering learners' cognitive characteristics and technology usage purposes
Two or more types of learner errors in technology-based mathematical activities can be identified, with improvement strategies suggested
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
